channel.title: package_feeds_packages_tvheadend on Opde Issues Tracker

item.title: compile.33
item.description: build number: 33 re-implement command docker pull immortalwrt/opde:sdk docker run -it --rm immortalwrt/opde:sdk zsh # or bash export http_proxy= # [your proxy], do not use localhost or 127.0.0.1 export https_proxy=$http_proxy opde feeds && opde config -a make package/feeds/packages/tvheadend/compile -j$(nproc) || make package/feeds/packages/tvheadend/compile V=s Compile.txt Applying ./patches/001-Makefile.hdhomerun-update-library-to-version-2018081.patch using plaintext: patching file Makefile.hdhomerun Applying ./patches/010-openssl-deprecated.patch using plaintext: patching file src/main.c Applying ./patches/030-gcc10.patch using plaintext: patching file src/input/mpegts.h patching file src/input.h Applying ./patches/040-fortify.patch using plaintext: patching file src/intlconv.

item.title: compile.21
